All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Board manages the current status of the game on board and on player's hands from the beginning to the end
    Card
    All variables and methods directly linked to a single card
    Cards
    SuperClass of all sort of decks containing zero to multiple cards
    Deck
    Main deck of the board, containing the cards not given to the players.
    Discard
    Discard deck, containing the cards discarded by the players.
    Game
    Gameflow Manager - Will manage the turns and call the moves chosen by the players
    Hand
    Player's hand.
    Main
    Main class which calls the board's constructor and the main game's loop.
    Player
    All variables and methods directly linked to the player
